statements: SELECT * FROM pilot_certifications ORDER BY certification_date ASC;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM pilot_certifications WHERE pilot_id = 101;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pilot_certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date, expiration_date FROM pilot_certifications WHERE certification_name = 'Airline Transport Pilot';
SELECT pilot_id, certification_name, training_records FROM pilot_certifications ORDER BY pilot_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM pilot_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC, expiration_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT pilot_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM pilot_certifications WHERE pilot_id = 1001
SELECT certification_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM pilot_certifications GROUP BY certification_name ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT DISTINCT certification_name FROM pilot_certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT pilot_id, certification_name, expiration_date FROM pilot_certifications WHERE certification_name LIKE '%Commercial%'
SELECT id, name, certification_type, certification_date FROM PilotCertifications;
SELECT certification_type, name, certification_date, id FROM PilotCertifications;
SELECT * FROM PilotCertifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, certification_date FROM PilotCertifications WHERE certification_type = 'Commercial';
SELECT name, certification_type FROM PilotCertifications WHERE certification_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT name, certification_type FROM PilotCertifications WHERE certification_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM PilotCertifications WHERE certification_type = 'Commercial' ORDER BY certification_date DESC

SELECT name, training_type, training_date FROM PilotCertifications JOIN TrainingRecords ON PilotCertifications.id = TrainingRecords.pilot_id WHERE training_type = 'Flight Simulator' ORDER BY training_date ASC
SELECT * FROM PilotCertifications WHERE name LIKE 'J%' OR name LIKE 'M%'
SELECT DISTINCT certification_type FROM PilotCertifications ORDER BY certification_type
SELECT * FROM Pilots;
SELECT full_name, certification_type FROM Pilots ORDER BY certification_date ASC;
SELECT pilot_id, full_name FROM Pilots WHERE certification_type = 'Commercial';
SELECT * FROM TrainingRecords WHERE training_duration > 60 ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT pilot_id, COUNT(record_id) AS 'Number_of_Records' FROM TrainingRecords GROUP BY pilot_id HAVING COUNT(record_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM Pilots ORDER BY certification_date DESC, full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, certification_type FROM Pilots WHERE certification_type = 'Commercial Pilot' AND certification_date > '2020-01-01';

SELECT pl.full_name, tr.training_date, tr.training_type FROM Pilots pl INNER JOIN TrainingRecords tr ON pl.pilot_id = tr.pilot_id WHERE tr.training_type = 'Safety Procedures' ORDER BY tr.training_date DESC;
SELECT pl.full_name, rr.requirement_name FROM Pilots pl LEFT JOIN RegulatoryRequirements rr ON pl.pilot_id = rr.requirement_id;

SELECT pl.full_name, tr.training_duration FROM Pilots pl INNER JOIN TrainingRecords tr ON pl.pilot_id = tr.pilot_id WHERE tr.training_duration > 2 ORDER BY tr.training_duration DESC, pl.full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Pilots;
SELECT name, certification FROM Pilots ORDER BY certification DESC;
SELECT aircraft_type, manufacturer, year_of_manufacture FROM Aircrafts WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2000;
SELECT pilot_id, name, certification FROM Pilots WHERE certification = 'Private Pilot';
SELECT * FROM TrainingRecords WHERE hours_completed >= 10 ORDER BY training_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Pilots WHERE certification = 'Commercial' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT pilot_id, name, certification FROM Pilots JOIN Certifications ON Pilots.certification = Certifications.certificate_name WHERE agency = 'FAA';
SELECT aircraft_type, manufacturer, year_of_manufacture FROM Aircrafts ORDER BY year_of_manufacture DESC;

SELECT Pilots.name, TrainingRecords.training_date, TrainingRecords.hours_completed FROM Pilots JOIN TrainingRecords ON Pilots.pilot_id = TrainingRecords.pilot_id WHERE TrainingRecords.hours_completed > 100;
SELECT * FROM Certifications WHERE valid_until < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Pilot;
SELECT id, name, age FROM Pilot WHERE age > 30;
SELECT model, manufacturer, year_of_manufacture FROM Aircraft ORDER BY year_of_manufacture DESC;
SELECT certification_name, authority, expiry_date FROM Certification WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT Pilot.name, Training.training_name, Training.duration_hours FROM Pilot JOIN Pilot_Training ON Pilot.id = Pilot_Training.pilot_id JOIN Training ON Pilot_Training.training_id = Training.id;
SELECT * FROM Pilot;
SELECT name, age FROM Pilot WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Aircraft ORDER BY year_of_manufacture DESC;
SELECT certification_name, expiry_date FROM Certification WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT Pilot.name, Training.training_name FROM Pilot INNER JOIN Pilot_Training ON Pilot.id = Pilot_Training.pilot_id INNER JOIN Training ON Pilot_Training.training_id = Training.id;
